# value(forComponent:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the value for a given calendar unit.

## Declaration

```swift
func value(forComponent unit: NSCalendar.Unit) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **unit**: The calendar unit for which to retrieve its value. Do not pass [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCalendar/Unit/calendar] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCalendar/Unit/timeZone].

## Return Value

The value for the given calendar unit.

## Discussion

This method allows for component values to be retrieved for an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCalendar/Unit] value.

## Accessing Components as Calendrical Units

- **setValue(_:forComponent:)**: Sets a value for a given calendar unit.
- **NSCalendar.Unit**: Calendrical units such as year, month, day and hour.
